My Projects

A selection of professional projects focused on data analysis, web development and automation that showcase my technical expertise and ability to solve complex problems.

Comprehensive Quality System

Centralized platform to monitor and manage all stages of the production process, rejections and repairs of devices in real-time. Enables data querying, custom report generation, metrics tracking and process documentation management.

Destacados

  • Improved traceability of the manufacturing process
  • Reduced response times for incidents
  • Optimized resource planning
  • Database integration for comparative analysis
React Django PostgreSQL Python Data Analysis Dashboards

Financial Tracking System

Personal financial management application for recording expenses and income, visualizing monthly and annual balances, analyzing trends through interactive charts, and exporting reports in CSV and PDF formats.

Destacados

  • Clear visualization of personal financial flow
  • Data-driven decision making
  • Visual analysis of spending trends
  • Customized report exports
React Chart.js Tailwind CSS Data Visualization
Ver proyecto Ver código

Crypto & Stocks Dashboard

Interactive dashboard for real-time tracking of cryptocurrency and stock investments. Includes price and variation monitoring, automatic calculation of profits/losses, configurable alerts, and graphical visualization of historical performance.

Destacados

  • Centralized management of financial assets
  • Investment decisions based on up-to-date data
  • Customized alerts for value changes
  • Visual analysis of historical performance
React Node.js Express Financial APIs Real-time Visualization
Ver proyecto Ver código

AI-Powered Automated Reporting System

System that uses artificial intelligence to connect with emails, extract relevant information, and generate automated reports. Analyzes incoming emails, organizes information into schedules, and generates reports in accessible formats.

Destacados

  • 70% reduction in email processing time
  • Automatic extraction of key information
  • Generation of structured reports without manual intervention
  • Integration with multiple data sources
Python Flask Gmail API Gemini Automation
